text: In the beginning when God created the heavens and the earth.
In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
And the Word became flesh and lived among us, and we have seen his glory, the glory as of a father's only son, full of grace and truth.
For God so loved the world that he gave his only Son, so that everyone who believes in him may not perish but may have eternal life.
since all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God;
category: The Roman Road: The Plan of Salvation

text: For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
category: The Roman Road: The Plan of Salvation

text: But God proves his love for us in that while we still were sinners Christ died for us.
category: The Roman Road: The Plan of Salvation

text: because if you confess with your lips that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
category: The Roman Road: The Plan of Salvation

text: For one believes with the heart and so is justified, and one confesses with the mouth and so is saved.
category: The Roman Road: The Plan of Salvation

text: All scripture is inspired by God and is useful for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness.
category: Listening: The Word of God and Prayer

text: This book of the law shall not depart out of your mouth; you shall meditate on it day and night so that you may be careful to act in accordance with all that is written in it. For then you shall make your way prosperous, and then you shall be successful.
category: Listening: The Word of God and Prayer

text: I treasure your word in my heart, so that I may not sin against you.
category: Listening: The Word of God and Prayer

text: Keep these words that I am commanding you today in your heart. Recite them to your children and talk about them when you are at home and when you are away, when you lie down, and when you rise.
category: Listening: The Word of God and Prayer

text: Indeed, the word of God is living and active, sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing until it divides soul from spirit, joints from marrow; it is able to judge the thoughts and intentions of the heart.
category: Listening: The Word of God and Prayer

text: Let us therefore approach the throne of grace with boldness, so that we may receive mercy and find grace to help in time of need.
category: Listening: The Word of God and Prayer

text: And this is the boldness we have in him, that if we ask anything according to his will, he hears us. And if we know that he hears us in whatever we ask, we know that we have obtained the requests made of him.
category: Listening: The Word of God and Prayer

text: And this is the testimony: God gave us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
Whoever has the Son has life; whoever does not have the Son of God does not have life.
"Do not let your hearts be troubled. Believe in God, believe also in me.
In my Father's house there are many dwelling places. If it were not so, would I have told you that I go to prepare a place for you?
And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again and will take you to myself, so that where I am, there you may be also.
Jesus said to him, "I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled, and do not let them be afraid.
Those of steadfast mind you keep in peace-- in peace because they trust in you.
But he was wounded for our transgressions, crushed for our iniquities; upon him was the punishment that made us whole, and by his bruises we are healed.
All we like sheep have gone astray; we have all turned to our own way, and the LORD has laid on him the iniquity of us all.
Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ! By his great mercy he has given us a new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,
Mighty King, lover of justice, you have established equity; you have executed justice and righteousness in Jacob.
Extol the LORD our God; worship at his footstool. Holy is he!
"You are worthy, our Lord and God, to receive glory and honor and power, for you created all things, and by your will they existed and were created."
But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.
We know that all things work together for good for those who love God, who are called according to his purpose.
For surely I know the plans I have for you, says the LORD, plans for your welfare and not for harm, to give you a future with hope.
But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus, his Son, purifies us from all sin.
If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.
Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
In all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

No temptation has overtaken you except what is common to mankind. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can endure it.
Cast your cares on the LORD and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
